se.umu.chlu0125.thirty.models

Class ScoreCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.umu.chlu0125.thirty.models.ScoreCalculator

  • public class ScoreCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Author: Christoffer Lundstrom Date: 20/06/2019

    Description: A class that calculates the Score of a dice combination. Uses an algorithm designed to find all Permutations of the Dices and compare all of them to find the largest sum possible for the given value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScoreCalculator() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int calcScore(java.util.ArrayList<Dice> dices, int findValue)
      Calculates the Score of the dices by iterating over an Integer array several passes so make sure no score gets missed.
      static int calcScoreLow(java.util.ArrayList<Dice> dices)
      Calculates the Score when a user chooses Low score (special case).
      static void compareArrays(int[] compare, int find)
      Calculates the Score of the dices by iterating over an Integer array several passes so make sure no score gets missed.
      static void findPermutations(int position, int[] arr)
      Finds all Permutations of the given Value-array.
